title: Trump’s National Bitcoin Reserve Is Still in the Works. Some States Have Already Taken Action on Theirs
full_text: Trump’s National Bitcoin Reserve Is Still in the Works. Some States Have Already Taken Action on Theirs. Arizona, New Hampshire, and Texas have enacted laws aimed at creating their own reserves.. During his 2024 U.S. presidential run, then-candidate Donald Trump promised to establish a strategic bitcoin reserve if he was elected for his second term in office after losing his reelection bid in… [+4591 chars]
